title: Richtech Dex demonstrates the potential of wheeled mobile manipulators
description:
Whether you call Dex a wheeled humanoid or a mobile manipulator, Richtech Robotics' system is a sign of things to come, says an investor.

The post Richtech Dex demonstrates the potential of wheeled mobile manipulators appeared first on The Robot Report.
